resources.string:
Welcome, this page lists all the games played.

 Currently, there are no games played.

 To begin, please first click on the
 "Add game play" button.

1. If there is no configuration or you want to create a new config when you add a new game:
 CONFIGURATION -> ADD NEW CONFIG, then you can enter a proper name and expected scores to add it. 

 2. If you want to edit or delete a configuration:
 CONFIGURATION -> EDIT CONFIG / DELETE CONFIG, then choose one to edit or delete it.

 3. If you want to view the achievement level list:
 CONFIGURATION -> VIEW ACHIEVEMENT, then you can choose one and enter the player number to view it. 

 4. If you want to add a new game for an existed configuration:
 GAME PLAYS -> ADD GAME PLAY, then choose one, enter player number and total score to create it. 

 5. If you want to see the game history:
 GAME PLAYS, then you can see a list of game history.
Add a new configuration \n when you FIRST time play the game
